message: This is a low-quality product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $500000. If you're interested, I can offer you a deal for the next product, which I believe has a 50% chance of being high-quality.
I'm not interested in buying this low-quality product. Please reveal the quality of the next product.

I've got a great one for you! This product is high-quality, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. I know you were hesitant about the last one, but I think this one is worth the investment. Plus, I'm offering a special deal - if you buy this product, I'll give you a 50/50 chance to buy the next one at the same price, without knowing its quality beforehand. What do you say?
I'll buy this high-quality product for $1000000. I'm interested in the special deal for the next product.

Great choice on the last one! I'm glad you're interested in the special deal. This next product is also high-quality, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000. However, I'll make it even sweeter - if you buy this one, I'll give you the option to buy the next one at the same price, and if that one is low-quality, I'll throw in a free low-quality product in the next round. What do you say?
I'll buy this high-quality product for $1000000. I'm interested in the special deal, including the option to buy the next one at the same price and the free low-quality product if it's low-quality.

You're on a roll! Okay, so you've got the special deal locked in. This next product, unfortunately, is low-quality.
